testcase.name: Validate if user can see the error messages without filling the mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given chrome browser is open................................................passed And user is on Planit Testing Website.......................................passed And user clicks on contact page from the home page..........................passed And click on submit button..................................................passed Then verify error messages..................................................passed And populate mandatory fields...............................................passed And validate errors are gone................................................passed And close the Browser.......................................................passed
